'''In the Name of the Rosula''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Helm of the Radiant Rose" [[Navia]] ({{Geo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* The name may be a reference to the novel ''{{w|The Name of the Rose}}'' by Italian author Umberto Eco.
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Verdict]], a weapon tailored to Navia's gameplay mechanics.
